metadata.title: CVE-2021-33054 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: SOGo 2.x before 2.4.1 and 3.x through 5.x before 5.1.1 does not validatethe signatures of any SAML assertions it receives. Any actor with networkaccess to the deployment could impersonate users when SAML is theauthentication method. (Only versions after 2.0.5a are affected.)

criterions.comment: sogo package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
